Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps and his team are hoping to bounce back against Belgium in the round of 16 of Euro 2024
The French national team is emphasizing that 'a new competition begins' after a poor start in the group stage
Others: The match is scheduled for July 1, 2024, at 6 pm
Belgium finished second in their group and have a mixed record with one win, one draw, and one defeat
